sqlMap.statement: SELECT ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME" ,OTSDCHNLDVCD AS "OTSDCHNLDVCD" ,OTSDCHNLINSTCD AS "OTSDCHNLINSTCD" ,OSDCHCOID AS "OSDCHCOID" ,SNDRCVLNKDVCD AS "SNDRCVLNKDVCD" ,SERVICETYPENAME AS "SERVICETYPENAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD16

SELECT ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME", OTSDCHNLDVCD AS "OTSDCHNLDVCD", OTSDCHNLINSTCD AS "OTSDCHNLINSTCD", OSDCHCOID AS "OSDCHCOID", SNDRCVLNKDVCD AS "SNDRCVLNKDVCD", SERVICETYPENAME AS "SERVICETYPENAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD16 WHERE ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME = #adptrBzwkGroupName#

select ROWNO AS "ROWNO", ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME", OTSDCHNLDVCD AS "OTSDCHNLDVCD", OTSDCHNLINSTCD AS "OTSDCHNLINSTCD", OSDCHCOID AS "OSDCHCOID", CASE WHEN SNDRCVLNKDVCD = '1' THEN 'OU' WHEN SNDRCVLNKDVCD = '2' THEN 'IN' WHEN SNDRCVLNKDVCD = '3' THEN 'IO' ELSE SNDRCVLNKDVCD END AS "SNDRCVLNKDVCD", SERVICETYPENAME AS "SERVICETYPENAME" FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME, OTSDCHNLDVCD, OTSDCHNLINSTCD, OSDCHCOID, SNDRCVLNKDVCD, SERVICETYPENAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD16 WHERE UPPER(ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME) LIKE '%'||#searchAdptrBzwkGroupName#||'%' ) WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum# ORDER BY 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD16 WHERE UPPER(ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME) LIKE '%'||#searchAdptrBzwkGroupName#||'%'

SELECT ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME", OTSDCHNLDVCD AS "OTSDCHNLDVCD", OTSDCHNLINSTCD AS "OTSDCHNLINSTCD", OSDCHCOID AS "OSDCHCOID", SNDRCVLNKDVCD AS "SNDRCVLNKDVCD", SERVICETYPENAME AS "SERVICETYPENAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD16 WHERE ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME = #adptrBzwkGroupName#

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIAD16 (ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME, OTSDCHNLDVCD, OTSDCHNLINSTCD, OSDCHCOID, SNDRCVLNKDVCD, SERVICETYPENAME) VALUES( #adptrBzwkGroupName#, #otsdChnlDvcd#,#otsdChnlInstCd#, #osdchCoId#, #sndrcvLnkDvcd#, #serviceTypeName#)

UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIAD16 SET OTSDCHNLDVCD = #otsdChnlDvcd#, OTSDCHNLINSTCD = #otsdChnlInstCd#, OSDCHCOID = #osdchCoId#, SNDRCVLNKDVCD = #sndrcvLnkDvcd#, SERVICETYPENAME = #serviceType# WHERE ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME = #adptrBzwkGroupName#
SELECT ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIAD16 WHERE UPPER(ADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME) LIKE '%'||#searchAdptrBzwkGroupName#||'%'
